website_summaries.verdict: Perfect weekender case with a stylish design.
pros: Smaller version of a classic from a well-known brand
Holds a good amount for travelling
cons: Metal arms on compartments aren’t always aligned, so need to be opened with care

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The case was very pretty, but too small. I honestly didn't think it would be that small. This would be perfect for someone who's not crazy about makeup and barely adds to their collection or used for travel. I could barely fit my whole collection in there. Like 10-15 items could only fit.
customer_reviews.author: AlleniaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Really Small even for a mini case
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY UNLESS YOU ARE 1000000% SURE it will work for you because it can't be returned. I currently own a mini train case and this one is considerably smaller than the average mini case. I have basic make up options and this doesn't fit my stuff. I was able to get 3 eyeshadow pallets, a masscara, 4 lipsticks 4 lip glosses, pressed powder compact and about 5 eyeliners in this case. Brushes, foundation, ect will not fit. I'm play around with it and see if I can organize it better and update review if I can.
customer_reviews.author: CowboyzCoffi

customer_reviews.title: Pink case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased makeup case for my wife as a gift. Looks great and seems like good quality item. Interior hinges extend and fold down easy without any problems. The bottom of each tray has hard plastic for easy cleaning. I believe she will enjoy the makeup case and find it useful. On the Negative side... dented on bottom. Box was not damaged so it was done during packaging or at manufacturer. I plan on returning for exchange when amazon gets this item back in stock with the same color at warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.T

customer_reviews.title: The case looks like at the pictures
customer_reviews.text: First they said if I give a 5 stars I will have a free present, but unfortunately I never got this present. The case looks like at the pictures, but let me tell you it's not practical if you have to open it every day! Then the box it's not heavy enough and the mirror never can't stay open, because the whole box will fall. My advice is you better choose another item I feel sorry that I spend my money on this!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Just invest in the larger one that rolls!! Both are Super freakin cute
customer_reviews.text: I keep having to remind myself that the word “MINI” is in the title, for a MINI makeup case, it’s great! Looking back I wish I had just bought a larger size, preferably something with wheels! I know I’m not going to get much use out of the handle, as the clasp is already slightly messed up, just enough to not close all the way so unfortunately this makes the whole thing a bit bulkier in regards to traveling (and not wanting to risk your makeup/brushes falling out all over the floor! This hasn’t happened yet, but it def feels like it could if I were too careless using the handle:/)
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Lugosi

customer_reviews.title: Make sure its what you want
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a small sturdy makeup case with a great mirror then this is it!!! It will hold the length of standard size palet of Urban Decay Naked eye shadow, but that's it! But if you want to hold larger items , odd shaped items, or a large quantity of items ( for example makeup, and nails) then this is probably too small for you.
customer_reviews.author: Its My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Cute case
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall. Its storage capacity is average for what it is. I love the mirror. The only frustration is that it stores everything on one side so the case constantly falls over. You have to have a way to prop it up to use the mirror. But in general, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: NekkidDogLady

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful well made case but small,
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY high quality made case. When I received it was was shocked at how nice it was. I was also shocked at how small it was. I didn't really pay attention to the "mini" part in the title which is not the seller's fault but mine. It would be great for short trips and vacations when you don't have a lot of time and don't want to lug a huge case.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Good size for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my daughter who uses it for dance competitions. We like the size and it fits her cosmetics perfectly. The color and the gem cut design on the case is very pretty. She was so excited when it arrived and got compliments on it. The only issue we have is that if the shelves are pulled out all the way and it is filled with cosmetics, that it can topple over.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Case is cute, good size, but cheap material. I just got it today and the first time I went to close it, I noticed the corner is already peeling off. Every time I close the case, the peeled part is going to catch and continue to rip. There's hot glue gun strings hanging all over the place. The weight isn't even so the case seems to tip when it's fully open. Don’t waste your money.. you can buy some for around the same price that would probably be better built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shany Mini Makeup Train Case with Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this train case. It's smaller than others but fits all of my makeup / skincare items. The size of this one makes it great for travel. If you have an extensive makeup collection, then I recommend you purchase a larger size. Or you could just use this one for your everyday makeup. I don't have the issue others have with it tipping over - I keep heavier items in the bottom. The quality is really nice. I see it lasting for a long time so I think its well worth the money. I also like the simple / classy exterior. Some of the other brands looked too "young" for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: mykajade

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, built well, im not satisfied on the price
customer_reviews.text: It's definetely a little smaller than it appears, but for my girlfriend, who has literally hundreds of makeup products, it works well for her to pack a few days worth (of a variety, meaning not the same makeup style every day). My biggest complaint is the price. Or only 15 to 20 more you can get one that is significantly larger however if you want something compact I suppose beggars can't be choosers
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lots of space, reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new makeup case! Beautiful blue color and it holds everything. So, no more digging through a bag to find what I need in a hurry! Thanks for such a amazing product at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Cute Way to Organize
customer_reviews.text: I bought this makeup train case for my daughter as a gift. I'm very happy with the quality and size. It's just right for her to keep her makeup and supplies organized and neat. The color is striking and so cute. She was thrilled with the gift. It allows her to store her makeup out of the shared bathroom and easily take it with her when she's on the go. It keeps up with her busy teenage lifestyle. I especially like that it includes a good sized mirror that folds out and fold out trays. I wish it had a lock so that her makeup was safer from her little sisters but we can't always have it all.
customer_reviews.author: Utah Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tips over
customer_reviews.text: Great size and love the color! It is compact so if you have a lot of makeup this isn't going to work for you. However, like the other reviews stated, it tips over if the bottom isn't heavy enough (if you take items out to use from the bottom). It drives me crazy everyday, so perhaps really think about that before you purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Improperly balanced and tips over when open
customer_reviews.text: When the trays are open when in use they are improperly balanced and fall over. I’ve never had a train case do this. Bought it in a pinch for travel and now I wish I sent it back because of how poorly balanced it is.!
customer_reviews.author: J Mili

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift item
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter and she really likes it! The drawers are slightly stiff so far so be careful when trying to pull them up and open. She has not yet put everything in it but I am sure she will this evening! She was happy with it. It looks just like it did in the picture. There is plenty of room inside and the mirror was a good selling point for us. We would recommend this for others who are looking for this type of item.
customer_reviews.author: Fiatoa

customer_reviews.title: Built well, compact.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, pretty sturdy. Personally, I won’t travel on a plane with it (I think it would hold up well!), but would bring on a road trip. Wished I ordered the larger one, but it holds the necessities. I might get the bigger one after giving this time. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Franziska Castello

customer_reviews.title: Ok!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box in the Peacock blue for my daughter for Christmas and it’s very nice-love the color- the reason for the 3 stars is it’s very small for the price- I think this box being made just a tiny bit wider with a little bit more space would have made this box an A+ So even though it’s a beautifuly made box, the size of it is NOT worth the money that I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Good for a starter Theater Make Up Kit and has a mirror

You will need to put your makeup remover in the bottom to counter balance the drawers when opened. It does hold everything I need for standard stage makeup and the mirror is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but little
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but too little to put anything of use in it. You can't stand a bottle of polish up but it's great for makeup if you don't pack much. Cute box though.
customer_reviews.author: CC Marie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CASE IMMENSLEY!

Small and convenient yet holds LOADS of product! All the colors looked great but I decided on this blue and she couldn't be happier. Me neither! Would definitely recommend it to anyone and would most definitely order again! Might even do so for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S

customer_reviews.title: It's been working great for me and keeps my make-up neatly in order
customer_reviews.text: Handy product. It's been working great for me and keeps my make-up neatly in order. Sped up my morning routine, because I don't have to dig through or dump out a make-up bag anymore. Plus it's cute and fun to use. Does tip over with the trays all extended, but wouldn't if I put some heavier items in the bottom compartment. I don't mind, just prop it up against the wall. UPDATE: Had to bump this review down from 5, because after a few months the lid got messed up some how and would never lock right again. Had to throw it away, but it was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: BabyWrangler

customer_reviews.title: Well made, solid case and really striking color.

customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ann Sydney S.

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again

customer_reviews.author: Kristie Wirth

customer_reviews.title: I would order case again.

This case is perfect. When I opened my package, which was delivered on time I smiled. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little girls

I have the lightest objects (a few makeup brushes) in the top shelf, but it still tilts backwards. Again, its okay, but I wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Open it before give it to anyone

It tips over if you have it all the way open to use the mirror..
customer_reviews.author: User71807

customer_reviews.title: Travel ideal

Its compact and easy to spot.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and green! Does the job!

I think it would be best for traveling with your makeup essentials or for a teen. I think it is relatively well made. I like that the trays inside are lined with plastic that makes it easier to wipe out when makeup spills inside. It is a little lightweight, though, and it will topple over if the products inside aren't distributed evenly. I also think the latch could be a little more sturdy. But overall, I am pleased with this eye-catching and functional little jewel toned case.

product_meta.title: SHANY Mini Makeup Train Case with Mirror in Black and Silver Frame
product_meta.description: Color:Dark BlackThe SHANY Mini Makeup Train Case is a stylishly cute and compact makeup case to ensure the safety and organization of your cosmetics and tools. This case measures at 9 inches X 6 inches X 6 inches and comes with two extendable trays that can easily fit our Perfect Canvas Convention, Eye Shadow Singles, and LL Creams. The case design is so versatile that it can also be used to store nail art products, our UV dryers and fashion accessories. Its uses are limited by your imagination. Each tray and the bottom compartment is made from a dust-proof acrylic sheets that are easy to clean and maintain. A separate compartment with an embedded mirror will help you apply makeup on-the-go. The case exterior is built with aluminum corners and lockable latches. The SHANY Mini Makeup Train Cases come in a wide variety of colors to ensure you find the best one for your personality. This is a great buy for tweens and makeup novices. The SHANY Makeup Case Warranty extends to all SHANY cases. If your case arrives damaged during the shipping process or if the product if defective, we will gladly replace it. Please allow 1- 2 weeks for the replacement to arrive. All of our products meet PETA’s cruelty-free standard and are designed by makeup professionals in the U.S.A
